# indexPathBeforeUpdate

**Instance Property**

The index path of the item before the update.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var indexPathBeforeUpdate: IndexPath? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `nil` for an action of type [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionView/UpdateAction/insert].

## Accessing the Item Changes

- **indexPathAfterUpdate**: The index path of the item after the update.
- **updateAction**: The action being performed on the item.
- **NSCollectionView.UpdateAction**: Constants indicating the type of action being performed on an item.
- **NSCollectionView.ScrollDirection**: Constants indicating the scrolling direction for the layout.
